a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Levelized cost of energy by technology, World, 1983 to 2021
The average cost per unit of energy generated across the lifetime of a new power plant. This data is expressed in US
dollars per kilowatt-hour, adjusted for inflation.

text.textPath: Fossil fuels – high end of the price range
Fossil fuels – high end of the price range
Fossil fuels – low end of the price range
Fossil fuels – low end of the price range

text.tspan: Note: Data is expressed in constant constant 2021 US$.
